original_text: and Jerusalem and Idumea and from beyond the Jordan and from around Tyre and Sidon. When the great crowd heard all that he was doing, they came to him.
korean_text: 유대와 예루살렘과 이두매와 요단 강 건너편과 또 두로와 시돈 근처에서 많은 무리가 그가 하신 큰 일을 듣고 나아오는지라

sentences.original_text: and from around Tyre and Sidon
When the great crowd heard all that he was doing
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 무리가 그가 하는 모든 일을 들었을 때
